name: Ski Champ
description:
Ski Champ is the ultimate skiing simulation game for your iPhone. Well, maybe not the ultimate, but is a lot of fun. But one thing you should know, no one has ever finished the game. It is just too hard.

Do you think you have what it takes?

Just hold your finger on the screen to guide the skier through the flags until you hit the end. Hit a flag, a tree, or take your finger off the screen.

But be warned, each level gets longer and harder.

No ads, no in app purchases. One price for the complete game.
